text: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart
author: Roy T. Bennett

text: It's not the load that breaks you down, it's the way you carry it
author: Lou Holtz

text: When we are no longer able to change a situation, we are challenged to change ourselves
author: Viktor E. Frankl

text: Do you want to know who you are? Don't ask. Act! Action will delineate and define you
author: Thomas Jefferson

text: Nothing in the world is ever completely wrong. Even a stopped clock is right twice a day
author: Paulo Coelho

text: Of course motivation is not permanent. But then, neither is bathing; but it is something you should do on a regular basis
author: Zig Ziglar

text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing
author: Walt Disney

text: The only thing standing between you and your goal is the bullshit story you keep telling yourself as to why you can't achieve it
author: Jordan Belfort

text: When someone tells me no, it doesn't mean I can't do it, it simply means I can't do it with them
author: Karen E. Quinones Miller

text: When all is said and done, more is said than done
author: Lou Holtz

text: Get going. Move forward. Aim High. Plan a takeoff. Don't just sit on the runway and hope someone will come along and push the airplane. It simply won't happen. Change your attitude and gain some altitude. Believe me, you'll love it up here
author: Donald Trump

text: Live your truth. Express your love. Share your enthusiasm. Take action towards your dreams. Walk your talk. Dance and sing to your music. Embrace your blessings. Make today worth remembering
author: Steve Maraboli

text: If you start by promising what you don't even have yet, you'll lose your desire to work towards getting it
author: Paulo Coelho

text: If you have a dream, don’t just sit there. Gather courage to believe that you can succeed and leave no stone unturned to make it a reality
author: Dr Roopleen

text: The individual who says it is not possible should move out of the way of those doing it
author: Tricia Cunningham

text: When defeat comes, accept it as a signal that your plans are not sound, rebuild those plans, and set sail once more toward your coveted goal
author: Napoleon Hill

text: And will you succeed? Yes indeed, yes indeed! Ninety-eight and three-quarters percent guaranteed!
author: Dr. Suess

text: All great achievements require time
author: Maya Angelou

text: It is not a daily increase, but a daily decrease. Hack away at the inessentials
author: Bruce Lee

text: All men want, not something to do with, but something to do, or rather something to be
author: Henry David Thoreau

text: You can't build a reputation on what you are going to do
author: Henry Ford

text: Every day People straighten up the hair, why not the heart?
author: che guevara

text: I cannot compromise my respect for your love. You can keep your love, I will keep my respect
author: Amit Kalantri

text: In the name of the Pizza Lord. Charge!
author: Jim Butcher

text: Find a purpose to serve, not a lifestyle to live
author: Criss Jami

text: The foolish man seeks happiness in the distance. The wise grows it under his feet
author: James Oppenheim

text: Love is forgiving, accepting, moving on, embracing, and all encompassing. And if you’re not doing that for yourself, you cannot do that with anyone else
author: Steve Maraboli

text: Hope in the shadow of fear is the world's most powerful motivator
author: Neal Shusterman

text: Focus on making yourself better, not on thinking that you are better
author: Bohdi Sanders

text: To overcome fear is the quickest way to gain your self-confidence
author: Roy T. Bennett

text: You are a divine being. You matter, you count. You come from realms of unimaginable power and light, and you will return to those realms
author: Terence McKenna

text: When you're following your inner voice, doors tend to eventually open for you, even if they mostly slam at first
author: Kelly Cutrone

text: Rise and rise again until lambs become lions
author: Robin Hood

text: To progress in life, I don’t focus on how much I have done but on how much I have yet to do
author: Idowu Koyenikan

text: But one of the worst results of being a slave and being forced to do things is that when there is no one to force you any more you find you have almost lost the power of forcing yourself
author: C.S. Lewis

text: It's not that some people have willpower and some don't... It's that some people are ready to change and others are not
author: James Gordon

text: Life always begins with one step outside of your comfort zone
author: Allan Rufus

text: Many times in life, we are held back from achieving our goals because we do not commit ourselves wholeheartedly. With an escape route in mind, we hold ourselves back from giving our all
author: idowu koyenikan

text: Face reality as it is, not as it was or as you wish it to be
author: Jack Welch

text: Every challenge you face today makes you stronger tomorrow. The challenge of life is intended to make you better, not bitter
author: Roy T. Bennett

text: You have the power to heal your life, and you need to know that. We think so often that we are helpless, but we're not. We always have the power of our minds…Claim and consciously use your power
author: Louise L. Hay

text: The quality of a man's life is in direct proportion to his commitment to excellence, regardless of his chosen field of endeavor
author: Vince Lombardi

text: Where did we ever get the crazy idea that in order to make children do better, first we have to make them feel worse? Think of the last time you felt humiliated or treated unfairly. Did you feel like cooperating or doing better?
author: Jane Nelsen

text: Ability is what you're capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it
author: Lou Holtz

text: I said Somebody should do something about that. Then I realized I am somebody
author: Lily Tomlin

text: I just want to be someone, to mean something to anyone…
author: Charlotte Eriksson

text: Control Your Own Destiny or Someone Else Will
author: Jack Welch

text: Edit your life frequently and ruthlessly. It's your masterpiece after all
author: Nathan W. Morris

text: Our Age of Anxiety is, in great part, the result of trying to do today’s jobs with yesterday’s tools!
author: Marshall McLuhan

text: The voice says, maybe you don't go to hell for the things you do. Maybe you go to hell for the things you don't do. The things you don't finish
author: Chuck Palahniuk

text: Life's short. Live passionately
author: Marc A. Pitman

text: If an apology is followed by an excuse or a reason, it means they are going to commit same mistake again they just apologized for
author: Amit Kalantri

text: Desire is the key to motivation, but it’s determination and commitment to an unrelenting pursuit of your goal - a commitment to excellence - that will enable you to attain the success you seek
author: Mario Andretti

text: Do it badly; do it slowly; do it fearfully; do it any way you have to, but do it
author: Steve Chandler

text: A challenge only becomes an obstacle when you bow to it
author: Ray A. Davis

text: You make mistakes, mistakes don't make you
author: Maxwell Maltz

text: I am so grateful for my troubles. As I reflect back on my life, I have come to realize that my greatest triumphs have been born of my greatest troubles
author: Steve Maraboli

text: Writer’s block results from too much head. Cut off your head. Pegasus, poetry, was born of Medusa when her head was cut off. You have to be reckless when writing. Be as crazy as your conscience allows
author: Joseph Campbell

text: Talent is a wonderful thing, but it won't carry a quitter
author: Stephen King

text: When God takes out the trash, don't go digging back through it. Trust Him
author: Amaka Imani Nkosazana

text: It has been my philosophy of life that difficulties vanish when faced boldly
author: Isaac Asimov

text: Never run from the enemy, tackle them
author: Victoria Addino

text: Follow your bliss and doors will open where there were no doors before
author: Joseph Campbell

text: I found an inner strength to fight for myself. It was clear that nobody else would
author: Tehmina Durrani

text: If we judge ourselves only by our aspirations and everyone else only their conduct we shall soon reach a very false conclusion
author: Calvin Coolidge

text: Dear me, one day I'll make you proud
author: Charlotte Eriksson

text: It is only in our darkest hours that we may discover the true strength of the brilliant light within ourselves that can never, ever, be dimmed
author: Doe Zantamata

text: The truly terrible thing is that everybody has their reasons
author: Jean Renoir

text: No one asks how to motivate a baby. A baby naturally explores everything it can get at, unless restraining forces have already been at work. And this tendency doesn't die out, it's wiped out
author: B.F. Skinner

text: Do not sit still; start moving now. In the beginning, you may not go in the direction you want, but as long as you are moving, you are creating alternatives and possibilities
author: Rodolfo Costa

text: I need to stop getting into situations where all my options are potentially bad
author: Jack Campbell

text: You don't go walking into the proverbial lion's den lightly. You start with a good breakfast
author: Jim Butcher

text: Curiosity is the engine of achievement
author: Ken Robinson

text: Live Long and Prosper
author: Leonard Nimoy

text: When you live your life by poor standards, you inflict damage on everyone who crosses your path, especially those you love
author: Jordan Belfort

text: We see things not as they are, we see them as we are
author: Morrie Camhi

text: No one wakes up in the morning and says, 'I want to gain 150 pounds and I will start right now!
author: Tricia Cunningham

text: Stop searching the world for treasure, the real treasure is in yourself
author: Pablo

text: Motivation is the fuel, necessary to keep the human engine running
author: Zig Ziglar

text: Anything which is physically possible can always be made financially possible; money is a bugaboo of small minds
author: Robert A. Heinlein

text: Intelligence is more important than strength, that is why earth is ruled by men and not by animals
author: Amit Kalantri

text: We love being mentally strong, but we hate situations that allow us to put our mental strength to good use
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

text: He had made himself believe that he was going to get well, which was really more than half the battle
author: Frances Hodgson Burnett

text: Motivation comes from working on things we care about. It also comes from working with people we care about
author: Sheryl Sandberg

text: Go as far as you can see and you will see further
author: Zig Ziglar

text: Everyone has the fire, but the champions know when to ignite the spark
author: Amit Ray

text: I put on the boots and kicked some monster ass
author: Jim Butcher

text: While intent is the seed of manifestation, action is the water that nourishes the seed. Your actions must reflect your goals in order to achieve true success
author: Steve Maraboli

text: Focus on what you are and what you can rather than what others aren't & can't. You have to win; they don't necessarily have to lose for you!
author: Alok Mishra

text: You touch some of the reasons for my going, not for my staying away
author: Charles Dickens

text: I can’t think of anything more disheartening than living a life without a clear purpose
author: Daniel Willey

text: Money is like gasoline during a road trip. You don’t want to run out of gas on your trip, but you’re not doing a tour of gas stations
author: Tim O'Reilly

text: Keep creating: the world yearns to celebrate your next masterpiece
author: Ken Poirot

text: Patience is the only way you can endure the gray periods
author: Teri Hatcher

text: The war to preserve the privilege of mythmaking
author: Marvin Bell

text: Kindness is universal. Sometimes being kind allows others to see the goodness in humanity through you. Always be kinder than necessary
author: Germany Kent

text: We all grow tired eventually; it happens to everyone. Even the sun, at the close of the year, is no longer a morning person
author: Joyce Rachelle

text: Be more than motivated, be more than driven, become literally obsessed to the point where people think you're fucking nuts
author: David Goggins

text: The hardest part of any important task is getting started on it in the first place. Once you actually begin work on a valuable task, you seem to be naturally motivated to continue
author: Brian Tracy

text: Motivation is when your dreams put on work clothes
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: I felt like poisoning a monk
author: Umberto Eco

text: Most people who decide to grow personally find their first mentors in the pages of books
author: John C. Maxwell

text: If only we had the certainty in our strength that we do in our weaknesses and capacity for failure - oh how wonderful life would be
author: Daniel Mangena

text: What makes the engine go? Desire, desire, desire
author: Stanley Kunitz

text: Money is like gasoline during a road trip. You don’t want to run out of gas on your trip, but you’re not doing a tour of gas stations
author: Tim O'Reilly

text: Success in life is not for those who run fast, but for those who keep running and always on the move
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

text: Get immersed in the beauty that surrounds you. No filters, edits, or adjustments. Experience the colors, sounds, textures and smells within your reach. Live
author: C. Toni Graham

text: Live with Fulfillment, Serve with Passion so in this Lifetime you will have the ablility to Die with NO Regrets
author: Randy Gonzales

text: Faithfulness in small things leads to faithfulness in great things, and never the other way around.
author: Pastor Jerry L. Lewis

text: If you practice hard, you can win every battle
author: Manny Pacquiao

text: A life fueled by passions is like riding on the back of a dragon
author: Suzy Kassem

text: There is no tomorrow and there was no yesterday; if you truly want to accomplish your goals you must engulf yourself in today
author: Noel DeJesus

text: If you're reading this, I hope God opens incredible doors for your life this year. Greatness is upon you. You must believe it though
author: Germany Kent

text: Spend more time doing things that make you forget about the time
author: Charlotte Eriksson

text: Fear of the LORD is the beginning of knowledge. Only Fools despise wisdom and discipline
author: Eddie Johnson

text: Nothing is born into this world without labor
author: Rob Liano

text: People who work in an environment where doing their best is recognized have a better chance of feeling good about their work
author: Marilyn Suttle

text: When we pray we admit defeat
author: Anthony Burgess

text: motivating people, forcing them to your will, gives you a cynical attitude toward humanity. It degrades everything it touches
author: Frank Herbert

text: Tis in ourselves that we are thus or thus. Our bodies are our gardens to the which our wills are gardeners
author: William Shakespeare

text: The heights charm us, but the steps do not; with the mountain in our view we love to walk the plains
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

text: A professional is one who does his best work when he feels the least like working
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

text: Rejection is a challenge
author: Veronica Purcell

text: If you don't write when you don't have time for it, you won't write when you do have time for it
author: Katerina Stoykova Klemer

text: When you experience a negative circumstance or event, do not dwell on it. Be proactive — put your attention on what you need to do to bring the situation to a positive result
author: Rodolfo Costa

text: Where there is life, there is hope
author: Alyson Noel

text: We are motivated more by aversion to the unpleasant than by a will toward truth, freedom, or healing. We are constantly attempting to escape our life, to avoid rather than enter our pain we, and we wonder why it is so difficult to be fully alive
author: Stephen Levine

text: but I have no mind for business and considered staying awake to be enough of an accomplishment
author: David Sedaris

text: Act as if it was, and it will be
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

text: I prefer to be on the side of losers, the misunderstood or lonely people rather than writing about the strong and powerful
author: Núria Añó

text: Virtually everyone needs motivation of some sort, but when you are in love - that is motivation enough, it turns many into poets and painters, it spurs the creativity in you
author: Bernard Kelvin Clive

text: If you can remember why you started, then you will know why you must continue
author: Chris Burkmenn

text: If you want to be happy, you need to set your mind on happiness
author: Ana Kostovska

text: Walk free from the long shadows cast by small people
author: Fennel Hudson

text: No matter how smart we may think we are, no matter how committed we are to our truth, we can lose our way
author: Kamal Ravikant

text: It’s possible to be flippant here, when Jihadists fly aircraft into buildings they shout God is Great, what do atheists shout when they do it?
author: Martin Amis

text: There are people who are waiting to be motivated by you
author: Neeraj Agnihotri

text: It still holds true that man is most uniquely human when he turns obstacles into opportunities
author: Eric Hoffer

text: Sometimes we have to soak ourselves in the tears and fears of the past to water our future gardens
author: Suzy Kassem

text: The greatest win is walking away and choosing not to engage in drama and toxic energy at all
author: Lalah Delia

text: I have moments that aren't too bad, but there's always something I'm struggling with, or feeling guilty about. I just figured I needed to try harder, but I find it difficult to sustain that motivation
author: William P. Young

text: I often lose motivation, but it's something I accept as normal
author: Bill Rodgers

text: Recognize that throughout this beautiful day,you have an incredible amount of opportunities to move your life into the direction you want it to go
author: Steve Maraboli

text: Cream always rises to the top...so do good leaders
author: John Paul Warren

text: While others were dreaming about it - I was getting it done
author: Nathan W. Morris

text: If I didn't have Lincoln's butt to stare at the whole time, motivation would be a lot harder to come by
author: Jessica Shirvington

text: Believe in yourself. Under-confidence leads to a self-fulfilling prophecy that you are not good enough for your work
author: Dr Roopleen

text: Every adversity brings new experiences and new lessons
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

text: If there was a reason why he preferred the liberal tendency to the conservative one (also held to by many of his circle), it was not because he found the liberal tendency more sensible, but it more closely suited his manner of life
author: Leo Tolstoy

text: Fear is a powerful stimulant
author: Margaret Atwood
